name: Hungry Knight (Kinda Good Games)
description:
Have you ever wondered what would happen if you combine a hungry knight, carrots and some spinny dice? No? Me neither. But thats what you are gonna find out here.

Find your wait out of this messy chess like style game by using ... carrots?

(This Game was made for the GMTK Game Jam)

IMPORTANT 

in one of the levels you the goal is hidden under the UI. Select a carrot to hide the blocking UI!

Controls

click on the carrots in the gui to make them follow your mouse

click again to place it
